EmailTemplate.name: Survey Feedback To Owner
EmailTemplate.subject: SurveyFeedback Item {!Survey_Feedback__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Managers_Feedback__c.OwnerFullName},
You have been assigned a new Manager Feedback item.
To view the item click here {!Managers_Feedback__c.InternalURL__c}{!Managers_Feedback__c.Id}
Thank you,
S3 Leadership Team
